UTME  
(i)   
(ii)  
  
WESTERN-DEL accepts NCE in Home Economics with a 
minimum of merit, ND/HND Home Economics credit level 
or Food Science or Hotel and Catering Management or 
any other related programme/subject. KWASU accepts   
IJMB and ‘A’ levels in two (2) Social Science or Science  
Subjects   
ND upper credit in  Hotel and Catering Management, HND  
lower credit in Hotel  and in Catering Management, NCE 
merit in Home Economics/Managment.  
REDEEMERS requires five (5) 'O' level cr edit passes to 
include English Language, Mathematics, and any other 
three (3) relevant  subjects.  
ABUAD requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes including 
English Language, Mathematics, and any three (3) from 
Arts, Social Science or Science Subjects.  
    (iii)  WESTERN-DEL requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, Mathematics/Physics, 
Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science, Food and 
Nutrition/Home Economics.  
    (iv)  KWASU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in Mathematics, 
English Language, two (2) Social Science subjects and any 
one (1) Science subject.  
    (v) PHC requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) 
from Government/History, Geography, Commerce, 
Accounting, Literature in English, Christian Religious 
Studies/Islamic Studies, Chemistry, Physics , Biology or 
Agricultural Science.  
(vi) KWASU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
and any three (3) Social Science subjects or two (2) Sciences 
and one (1) Social Science subjects or a combination of Arts 
and Social Science subjects. UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) REDEEMERS requires any three (3) subjects from Social  
Sciences or Arts.  
(ii) ABUAD requires any other three (3) subjects.
